content: flap and knit them knit the 34 40 other sole sts this is the new beginning of the round now you have 51 60 sole sts and 37 43 instep sts instep chart gusset decrease round 1 work instep in pattern as established ssk knit to 2 sts before end of sole k2tog round 2 work instep in pattern as established knit across all sole sts work these 2 rounds 11 12 times decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 37 43 instep sts and 29 36 sole sts foot continue instep in pattern as established while always plain knitting the sole sts work until foot is approx 2 inches shorter than desired length ©caoua coffee 2013 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved d artagnan v 1 page 3/4 d artagnan socks - by caoua coffee toe set-up for smaller size only shift the first 2 and the last 2 instep stitch over onto the sole needle s now you have 33 instep sts and 33 sole sts for larger size only shift the first and the last instep stitch over onto the sole needle s work one round follows k k2tog k17 k2tog k16 ssk k then knit all sole sts now you have 38 instep sts and 38 sole sts continue for both sizes toe round 1 decrease round k ssk knit to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k k ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k round 2 plain round knit around repeat these 2 rounds until you have 34 36 sts left then always work round 1 until there are 14 16 sts left finishing leaving a tail of at least 8 inches break yarn and close the toe using kitchener stitch weave in the ends then knit a second sock and enjoy about this pattern d artagnan is the protagonist of the novels the three musketeers by alexandre dumas père the character is initially a hotheaded poor young nobleman from gascony wanting to joint the musketeers in paris there he quickly becomes friends with the three musketeers athos porthos and aramis and has a series of adventures which put him at odds with cardinal richelieu in the end richelieu then first minister of france is impressed by d artagnan and makes him a lieutenant of the musketeers this begins his long career of military service as detailed in the sequels to dumas famous novel the lines of cables above a textured background in the pattern of these socks fit d artagnan s character perfectly always straightforward even when faced with a rough patch in life the patterns of my musketeer socks are just low-key enough to be wearable for all the men in your life and just interesting enough to save the knitter from being bored to tears while making them ____ ©caoua coffee 2013 this pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved there s one exception you are explicitly
